title: Forever young
creator_credit: Learning Corporation of America and Robin Lehman
brief_description: Examines the fear of aging and what post-retirement years are really like by interviewing a group of active, interested people, all over the age of 65. They speak of their enjoyment and appreciation of life, their health, happiness, retirement, sex and death.
